word_mean: 环丙烷：无色易燃易爆气体，C3H6，有特殊气味和辛辣味，用作吸入的全身麻碎药。因其能燃烧，现已极少使用

sentence.Network_en: Cyclopropane rings are included within larger systems, such as triterpenes.
sentence.Network_cn: 三元环包含在较大的环系统中,像三萜类中.

sentence.Network_en: Under the optimum condition the yield of isopropyl cyclopropane carboxylate is 92 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 在最佳反应条件下,环丙烷羧酸异丙酯的产率达92%.

sentence.Network_en: Cyclopropane carbonyl chloride is an important intermediate.
sentence.Network_cn: 环丙甲酰氯是一种重要的中间体.
